member.name: T:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigFieldAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to mark fields and properties that can be loaded via ConfigObject

member.name: P:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigFieldAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the field in the config, if left blank, the name of the code field is used

member.name: P:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigFieldAttribute.Required
member.summary: If this config field is required to exist during deserialization

member.name: P:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigFieldAttribute.Separator
member.summary: Separator string for array types

member.name: T:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigParserAttribute
member.summary: Config parser attribute

member.name: P:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigParserAttribute.TargetType
member.summary: Type targeted by this parser

member.name: P:ConfigLoader.Attributes.ConfigParserAttribute.Priority
member.summary: Parser priority

member.name: T:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject
member.summary: Base class for objects that can be auto-loaded from ConfigNodes using the ConfigFieldAttribute

member.name: P:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject.NodeName
member.summary: Name used for the ConfigNode when saving, must be overriden to change from the default "NODE"

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject.#ctor(ConfigNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a ConfigObject from the given ConfigNode
member.param: ConfigNode to load the object from
If the object should be loaded right away, defaults to true

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject.GetValue(ConfigNode,System.String,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the given value from a ConfigNode
member.param: Node to get the value from
Name of the value to get
If this field is mandatory or not
member.returns: The loaded value from the node
member.exception: Thrown when a mandatory field is not found or could not be loaded

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject.AddValue(ConfigNode,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Add a value or node to the given ConfigNode
member.param: Node to add the value or node to
Name of the value (not used for nodes)

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject.Load(ConfigNode)
member.summary: Loads data from the given ConfigNode to the object

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.ConfigObject.Save
member.summary: Saves the ConfigObject to a ConfigNode, then returns it The name of the created ConfigNode is taken from the NodeName property
member.returns: The created ConfigNode containing the saved data

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.Extensions.ConfigNodeExtensions.TryGetNode(ConfigNode,System.String,ConfigNode@)
member.summary: Tries to get a named ConfigNode from the given ConfigNode
member.param: Node to get the child node from
member.returns: True if the node has been found, false otherwise

member.name: T:ConfigLoader.Utils
member.summary: Collection of utility methods

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.Utils.ParseArray(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a comma separated string line to a string array. Entries are space trimmed and never empty
member.returns: The resulting string non-empty string array

member.name: M:ConfigLoader.Utils.ParseArray(System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: Parses a string line with given delimiter to a string array. Entries are space trimmed and are never empty
member.param: Char delimiters to separate the array
member.returns: The resulting string non-empty string array
